snippet.title: Barney Bear meets Santa Claus - Amiga full playthrough
snippet.description:
Free Spirit Software (C) 1990, all rights reserved, made in the USA. Here´s some learning fun for your children. Now even the youngest children can play and learn for hours at the time, without your supervision! Which includes music, animation, sound effects and a full array of learning activities.

00:00 Intro
00:56 Story book
03:45 Word game
04:43 Find picture
05:11 Find the Elf
06:49 Paint
09:49 Toy factory
